document_data.name: Cream of Long Years
document_data.creator: [[Ezzat]]
document_data.mainbody: A '''''cream of long years''''' was a magical item that countered aging and preserved [[undead]].
document_data.Description: The cream was thick and lumpy. [[Jar]]s of it normally contained six applications.
document_data.Powers: When applied to the skin of a living person, ''cream of long years'' reduced their age by one year overnight. Multiple applications in the same 24-hour period did not stack. When applied to the skin of a corporeal undead, it stopped them from rotting for three months.
document_data.History: In the {{yearlinkName|1367}}, the [[lich]] [[Ezzat]] had recently developed the recipe for such a cream. He used it to preserve himself.
document_data.Creation: The cream was derived from the ''[[potion of longevity]]''.
